definition: Everest (name)/Colonel Sir George Everest (1790-1866), British Surveyor-General of India 1830-1843/transliteration refers to Mt Everest 珠穆朗瑪峰|珠穆朗玛峰, Mt Chomolungma or Qomolangma (Tibetan)/Nepalese: Sagarmatha
forehead/horizontal tablet or inscribed board/specified number or amount
abbr. for the Philippines 菲律賓|菲律宾[Fei1 lu:4 bin1]
member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker

sentences.english: The first assent of Mount Everest took place in 1953.
sentences.chinese: 第一宗攀登額菲爾士峯壯舉發生於1953年。
